Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 66th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1966...
Injured on 8/16/1968 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 5/15/1972 with a Spasms Back, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 6/15/1973 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/12/1973 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 4th round, 68th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1978...
Injured on 5/24/1979 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/14/1980 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/2/1980 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 9/25/1981...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Boston on 3/2/1986 (Going to CHW: P K. Rogers. Going to BOS: P T. Filer)...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/6/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $4,150,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/27/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $2,250,000 per year...
